meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Amazons, a legendary nation of female warriors.
meanings.sent1: The amazonian warrior displayed great courage in battle.
meanings.sent2: The amazonian tribe was known for their fierce fighting skills.
meanings.sent3: The amazonian warrior cracked a joke before charging into battle.
meanings.sent4: Her amazonian strength was unmatched on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The amazonian queen led her army with grace and power.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Amazon River or the surrounding region.
meanings.sent1: The amazonian rainforest is home to diverse wildlife.
meanings.sent2: Explorers ventured deep into the amazonian jungle.
meanings.sent3: The amazonian river whispered secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent4: The amazonian landscape was breathtakingly beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The amazonian ecosystem thrived with life and energy.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an Amazon woman in size, strength, or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The amazonian athlete broke the world record.
meanings.sent2: She had an amazonian physique that turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: The amazonian model tripped on her own long legs during the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: His amazonian build made him a formidable opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The amazonian actress captivated audiences with her powerful presence.
